meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roger Craig Robin Carroll Leszek Pawlowicz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6831.

div.div: Battle of the Decades quarterfinal game 1.

td.p: Roger Craig, a data scientist from Brooklyn, New York
Robin Carroll, an instructional designer and curriculum developer from Atlanta, Georgia
Leszek Pawlowicz, a shovel bum from Flagstaff, Arizona

tr.td: A BRIEF TIME OF HISTORY
ONE-WORD BOOK TITLES
WE'RE A NORTH AMERICAN BAND!
WHAT'S IN A NAME?
BOOZE
A WORD TO THE "I"s
(Alex: Each correct response will end with the letter "I".)
